results.name: a(n) = A003415(A324886(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..3000
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
Index entries for sequences related to primorial numbers
program: A276086(n) = { my(m=1, p=2); while(n, m *= (p^(n%p)); n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (m); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 08 2019
